IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits rocky shores, but also found offshore (4967).  12 cm max TL (Ref. 31267).  Not a seasonal killifish (Ref. 27139).

dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Ntakimazi, G. 2006. Lamprichthys tanganicanus. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description: Endemic to Lake Tanganyika. Enters the delta of Malagarasi River.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Africa:  Endemic to the shore regions of Lake Tanganyika.

dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: Ntakimazi, G. 2006. Lamprichthys tanganicanus. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
LC
Least Concern

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2006

Assessor/s
Ntakimazi, G.

Reviewer/s
Snoeks, J. (Freshwater Fish Red List Authority) & Darwall, W. (Freshwater Biodiversity Assessment Programme)

Contributor/s

Justification
Endemic to Lake Tanganyika and the deltas of its major rivers. No widespread major threats identified.
